title: metrics: Raft IO and Raft Propose sections missing filters `by instance`.
body:
## Bug Report
As the title shows, the nightly metrics has lack of the filters on `instance` in the `Raft IO` and `Raft Propose` parts.
<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->
nightly
### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

### What did you expect?
![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/18441614/0f38c596-6784-42bf-8891-0d2eb0ca0736)

### What did happened?
![image](https://github.com/tikv/tikv/assets/18441614/8c96b11e-bea4-4724-a480-3040726115bb)
